dust.title: DUST
dust.description: The definitive channel for sci-fi. Home to a massive library of films and series – all absolutely free.

614623.title: DUST Collection | The Past
614623.description: The feeling that you have been here before. Presented by DUST.

614624.title: DUST Collection | International Films
614624.description: This compelling compilation of science fiction films showcases a variety of lived and imagined experiences from all ends of planet Earth. Presented by DUST.

614625.title: DUST Collection | Heroines
614625.description: This inspiring sci-fi collection honors films in which women take the helm, leading the universe through whatever chaos surrounds them. Presented by DUST.

614626.title: DUST Collection | Drama
614626.description: Throughout a series of imaginative science fiction films, dramatic stories are told by today’s established and up-and-coming filmmakers. Presented by DUST.

614627.title: DUST Collection | Romance
614627.description: A view of love in all forms, from physical to digital. This immersive collection of science fiction films finds love in unexpected places. Presented by DUST.

614628.title: DUST Collection | Rebels
614628.description: What makes a rebel? This collection of stellar science fiction films examines the rare, bold few who stand on the edge of their societies. Presented by DUST.

614629.title: DUST Collection | Love
614629.description: What will the great romances of tomorrow look like? This cutting-edge collection of science fiction films answers this question in unexpected ways. Presented by DUST.

614630.title: DUST Collection | Blast Off
614630.description: This equally compelling and disturbing collection of science fiction films explores humanity’s darker nature through a series of stories. Presented by DUST.

614631.title: DUST Collection | Antinomy
614631.description: A collection of absurd and self-contradictory science fiction films, which will make you question yourself and everyone around you. Presented by DUST.

614632.title: DUST Collection | Timelines
614632.description: Journey into the future by way of the past through a series of unusual science fiction films, which tell a larger story of man’s nature. Presented by DUST.

614692.title: DUST Collection | Double Trouble
614692.description: What happens when two very different souls must work together? This collection of sci-fi films explores the companionship of unlikely allies. Presented by DUST.

614693.title: DUST Collection | Thrills
614693.description: This chilling collection of sci-fi stories enters a realm of frightening territory, where nothing is as it seems and you can never rest. Presented by DUST.

614694.title: DUST Collection | The Universe
614694.description: What does it take to create an entire universe? These innovative science fiction films explore the possibilities in unusual worlds. Presented by DUST.

614695.title: DUST Collection | Human Plus
614695.description: A mind-blowing compilation of sci-fi films that explore the opportunities and dangers that are associated with an advanced form of humanity.

614696.title: DUST Collection | Bad Tech
614696.description: When we depend on technology, we open ourselves up to a world of possibilities- good and tragic. This film collection explores the outcomes. Presented by DUST.

614697.title: DUST Collection | Adventures
614697.description: Brave new worlds and amazing locales await in the new wild frontier of outer space adventures. What will you explore? Presented by DUST.

614698.title: DUST Collection | Spacetime
614698.description: What happens when you realize you’ve made a critical mistake, but you’re trapped in a time loop? This collection of bold sci-fi films finds out. Presented by DUST.

614699.title: DUST Collection | Mystery
614699.description: If you think you can easily solve this series of sci-fi mysteries, think again. A collection with countless twists, turns, and shocking conclusions. Presented by DUST.

614700.title: DUST Collection | Invasions
614700.description: When the world meets a group of galactic neighbors, the reaction to these unexpected visitors will soon dictate the fate of humanity. Presented by DUST.

614701.title: DUST Collection | Heroes
614701.description: Led by courageous, fascinating, and flawed heroes, this collection of imaginative science fiction films takes you to unusual places. Presented by DUST.

615879.title: 14 Minutes From Earth
615879.description: A mild-mannered, middle-aged executive takes a death-defying dive, returning from space to Earth without a rocket, to advance scientific exploration.

615880.title: Dr. Megavolt: From Geek to Superhero
615880.description: Dr Austin Richards performs as Dr MegaVolt in a Faraday suit at shows around the globe. Presented by DUST.

615881.title: Corrections
615881.description: Cyrus, a parole technician in a next-generation prison, who becomes obsessed with Alice, a beautiful and sociopathic inmate who the system seems unable to reform. Presented by DUST.

615882.title: The Time Agent
615882.description: The Time Agent by Jude Chun - Time travel is easy... You just wait. Presented by DUST.

615883.title: Sky Line
615883.description: In 1979, Arthur C. Clarke wrote a sci-fi novel about an elevator to outer space. This is the story of people who intend to make it a reality.

615884.title: DUST Collection | The Reconstruction of William Zero
615884.description: After a bizarre accident, a brilliant geneticist relearns his identity from his twin brother, who may not be telling him the whole story.

615885.title: ALT
615885.description: When Val Mayfield returns to her rural home of Poe County to bury her deceased father, she discovers a message from beyond the grave - setting off a perilous journey into a mysterious place found between life and death. Presented by DUST.

615903.title: Automata
615903.description: Automata Full Season by Van Alan In an alternate 1930's Prohibition-era New York City, it's not liquor that is outlawed but the future production of highly sentient robots known as automatons. Automata follows former NYPD detective turned private eye Sam Regal and his incredibly smart automaton partner, Carl Swangee. Together, they work to solve the case and understand each other in this dystopian America. Putting a science ﬁction twist on the classic hard-boiled detective drama, Automata explores a dystopian alternative version of Prohibition-era New York City, similarly shaped by moral panic even though the alcohol ﬂows freely here. In this universe, Prohibition doesn't ban drinking, but the further production of sapient androids that have become prevalent by the 1920s. As a result, the existing androids, called automatons, are shunned by society, relegated to an untouchable caste of servants despite their near-human thought capability, and are frequently subjected to hatred and violence. It's in this oppressive setting that human private detective Sam Regal (Basil Harris, "Grimm") and his automaton partner Carl Swangee (Doug Jones, The Shape of Water) work together to solve cases for both communities, learning to see humanity in one another while trying to prove that justice is still worth serving. Presented by DUST.

615904.title: Glimpse
615904.description: Glimpse is a short form scripted series that explores the exponential growth of our science and technology in relation to the human condition, and their intersection in life. Directed by The Edwards Brothers. Presented by DUST.

615905.title: The Space Invaders
615905.description: The history of arcade video games, the people who grew up playing them, and their efforts to collect and preserve their memories. Presented by DUST.

667724.title: DUST Collection: The DUST Holiday Special
667724.description: DUST, the sci-fi brand that presents bleeding-edge visions of the future, invites us to celebrate the holiday season with three provocative shorts.

667725.title: DUST Collection: The DUST Holiday Special II
667725.description: DUST, the sci-fi brand that presents bleeding-edge visions of the future, invites us to celebrate the holiday season with two provocative short films.

667726.title: DUST Collection: Mothers That Are Out of This World
667726.description: DUST, the sci-fi brand that presents bleeding-edge visions of the future, celebrates mothers throughout time and space with this marathon of shorts.

667727.title: DUST Collection: Fathers That Are Out of This World
667727.description: DUST, the sci-fi brand that presents bleeding-edge visions of the future, celebrates fathers throughout time and space with this 15-part episode.

667728.title: DUST Collection: Paging Planet Earth
667728.description: DUST, the sci-fi brand that presents bleeding-edge visions of the future, explores human existence in a decidedly inhospitable world for mankind.

667729.title: DUST Collection: Black Voices
667729.description: DUST, the sci-fi brand with bleeding-edge visions of the future, celebrates the contributions of Black filmmakers to the genre in a four-part episode.

667730.title: DUST Collection: Tech Crimes
667730.description: A combination of noir and science fiction, this four-part episode features films that depict the future of technology as a destructive force.

667731.title: DUST Collection: the Future
667731.description: Sci-fi brand DUST presents a series of captivating short films that explore a future world dictated by our actions in the past and present.

667732.title: DUST Collection: Troubled Relationships
667732.description: DUST, the sci-fi brand with dystopian visions of the future, explores the cold world we’re left with after it has become devoid of human affection.

667733.title: DUST Collection: Action
667733.description: A marathon of action-packed films full of epic intergalactic showdowns, unexpected conflicts and daring escapes. Presented by sci-fi brand DUST.

667734.title: DUST Collection: Brilliant Robots
667734.description: DUST, the sci-fi brand with dystopian visions of the future, presents a world where artificial intelligence begins to develop feelings.

667735.title: DUST Collection: Retro
667735.description: DUST, the sci-fi brand with bleeding-edge visions of the future, presents colorful depictions of possible futures that retain the style of the past.

667736.title: DUST Collection: Dystopias
667736.description: Can you survive amid a wasteland of fall and fear? Dystopic worlds have arrived in all their forms in this collection of short films.

667737.title: DUST Collection: Bright Futures
667737.description: The future looks bright in this short film collection that leaves you feeling better than before you pressed the play button on your remote.

667738.title: DUST Collection: Outer Space
667738.description: Past any star map, beyond any wormhole, the edge of all we know is calling, and we cannot help but answer its call in this collection of shorts.

667739.title: DUST Collection: Horror
667739.description: Science fiction is scary. This collection of short films proves that, so keep the lights on, your awareness sharp, and your head on a swivel.

667740.title: DUST Collection: Magic Moments
667740.description: Brave kids and tenacious teens use more than logic to solve the mysteries and magic moments of the universe in this collection of shorts.

667742.title: DUST Collection: Big Brother
667742.description: Endangered refugees. Supernatural outcasts. Black market androids. Cast aside and stripped of their freedoms, the thirst for purpose prevails.

667743.title: DUST Collection: Robots
667743.description: Whether it's a substitute for a spouse, a loving nanny, or an outdated device, there's a soul in the heart of every machine, for better or for worse.

667744.title: DUST Collection: Aliens
667744.description: When Mother Earth joins forces with the extraterrestrial, a new type of evolution emerges. Just let nature take its course in these short films.

667745.title: DUST Collection: Technology
667745.description: In this collection of shorts, when the potential of technology meets the power of emotion, anything is possible in the world around us.

667746.title: DUST Collection: Time Travel
667746.description: In time travel, nothing is as linear as it seems. Change your past and destroy your future. See it here in this collection of shorts.

667747.title: DUST Collection: Virtual Reality
667747.description: When navigating the possibilities and limitations of VR, these characters confront the meaning of humanity, identity, and ultimately, their mortality.

667748.title: DUST Collection: Comedy
667748.description: Aliens may invade us, AI might control us, friends may abandon us, and sometimes we get lost in space. Still, we must laugh in the face of danger.

667749.title: DUST Collection: Doppelganger
667749.description: Despite all your best intentions in every area of life, sometimes the only person standing in your way to success and happiness is "you."
